channel.title: CVE Feed for Helmholz -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Helmholz -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-34574|2024-08-04T00:19:46.604Z -- helmholz -- myrex24
item.description: In MB connect line mymbCONNECT24, mbCONNECT24 and Helmholz myREX24 and myREX24.virtual in all versions through v2.11.2 an authenticated attacker can change the password of his account into a new password that violates the password policy by intercepting and modifying the request that is send to the server.

item.title: CVE-2020-12527|2024-08-04T11:56:52.131Z -- helmholz -- myrex24
item.description: An issue was discovered in MB connect line mymbCONNECT24, mbCONNECT24 and Helmholz myREX24 and myREX24.virtual in all versions through v2.11.2. Improper access validation allows a logged in user to shutdown or reboot devices in his account without having corresponding permissions.

item.title: CVE-2024-5672|2024-07-11T19:49:42.244Z -- helmholz -- rex%20100
item.description: A high privileged remote attacker can execute arbitrary system commands via GET requests due to improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command.

item.description: A high privileged remote attacker can execute arbitrary system commands via GET requests due to improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command.
